Class AeCatalogHelper

java.lang.Object

public class AeCatalogHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Servlet designed to provide the WSDL which is part of a BPR deployment.

Method Detail

getCatalogWsdl

public static java.lang.String getCatalogWsdl(java.lang.String aEntry,
                                              java.lang.String aRequestURL)
                                       throws AeException
Returns the wsdl file loaded in a string based on the passed wsdl entry name. It uses the passed request url to fixup any imported other catalog entries.

Parameters:
aEntry - The wsdl catalog entry.
aRequestURL - The url the entry is being requested via for fixup purposes.
Throws:
AeException

getCatalogSchema

public static java.lang.String getCatalogSchema(java.lang.String aEntry,
                                                java.lang.String aRequestURL)
                                         throws AeException
Returns the schema file loaded in a string based on the passed schema entry name. It uses the passed request url to fixup any imported other catalog entries.

Parameters:
aEntry - The entry name in the catalog
aRequestURL - The url the catalog is being requested via for fixups.
Returns:
The schema as a string.
Throws:
AeException
